About StickerLah

We're a small Singaporean brand creating cute, quirky stickers and merchandise that celebrate local culture. From kopi jokes to merlion money, we aim to bring a smile to your day!

Every sticker is waterproof, UV-resistant, and made with love. üá∏üá¨
